Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers most of the time gives great feedback for my study. But, it's hard sometimes to reach out to them ask I have to attend consultation sessions or wait for my email to be reply with. But with the use of AI, I get my questions answer right away with a high credibility and I can even modify it to be suit my understanding.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback dive straight forward into the brief of the task. While AI also compare the work to the brief and also to how the general industry standard should be.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I can modify the AI answer to be suit my understanding and can research more on that topic using AI.
